amendment.description: Amendment provides health insurance to dependents of permanently and totally disabled veterans, as well as veterans who died from service connected disabilities, through the age of 26.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 68 printed in House Report 111-498 to provide health insurance to dependents of permanently and totally disabled veterans, as well as veterans who died from serviced connected disabilities, through the age of 26. Currently under CHAMPVA, which is administered by the Department of Veterans Affairs (VA), coverage can only be provided to dependent children up to the age of 23.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Teague amendment (A021) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A021) offered by Mr. Teague.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Teague amendment (A021) Agreed to by voice vote.
